name: RANDOM RPG [In Development]
description:
"Working, functinal..."

           -Some catgirl trap

RANDOM RPG is a platform game with rpg, action, roguelite elements, with alot of things dictated by rng.  Game is geared towards the farmers/grinders out there like me.

Game is currently in development, but you can donate if you feel like supporting the development!

Features:

  • Crafting
  • Farming
  • Endless grinding!
  • action paltformer with roguelite elements!
  • Block building!
  • Boss fighting
  • Characters completely randomized (looks, stats and name!)
  • various "game modes" to fit various styles of play.
  • permadeath (character gets rerolled upon death aside from certain modes)

I will occasionally stream my game on my twitch, tho not really active on it unless im streaming my game.

Rocket_Poop - Twitch
